title: Swatch beats Apple to China mobile payments market with Bellamy watch
text:
Swatch beats Apple to China mobile payments market with Bellamy watch 
Published By: AppleInsider.com - Today 
Swatch, the world's largest watchmaker by revenue, on Wednesday announced immediate Chinese availability of Bellamy, an NFC-toting watch cap...
